title: Ticket #1173: condor_q doesn't use projection with most display options
description:
When called with no display options or with -format, condor_q will use the queue-management api's projection feature (via the GetAllJobsByConstraint() function) so that the schedd only sends job ad attributes that will be used in condor_q's output. When other display options are given, such as -run or -globus, condor_q pulls full job ads. It should use projections whenever possible.

The BNL Atlas group has observed a schedd taking 3-4 seconds to answer a 'condor_q -globus' query on a queue of 4200 jobs. A projected query (done manually with -attributes) takes only 0.2 seconds.
remarks:
